about_the_game:
"The Three Kingdoms of Shadows: Xuzhou" is a factional struggle and resource management strategy game independently developed by me.
Players take on the role of Liu Bei, newly arrived in Xuzhou and lacking extensive experience, navigating various factions to shape history and gradually becoming a competent ruler and formidable warlord.
As a leader in chaotic times, you must balance policy management, resource constraints, warfare, and law.
The main storyline involves managing the city and society, but players must also skillfully engage with external lords and make the right decisions in historical events.
Conspiracy is the central theme. Historically, Liu Bei was designated by Tao Qian as his successor, but in this work, derived from "Records of the Three Kingdoms" and "Heroes' Chronicles," Liu Bei’s succession in Xuzhou is manipulated by the Chen Deng and Mi Zhu families, who chose him for his lack of experience, seeing him as a potential puppet.
Game Features
1. Choose the best advice from subordinates with conflicting opinions.
2. Formulate different legal and policy routes.
3. Wage war through resource management.
4. Complete storyline missions and determine the course of history.
Note: The current game does not represent the final quality; many assets and visuals will be upgraded and revamped later.
